Record Group 1. Governance, administration, and 3-School affairs (1888-2016; 64.42 linear feet)
Subseries III.C Evaluations of the Schools
Self-Evaluation Report for New York Association of Independent Schools (2 folders)
Self-Evaluation Report for New York Association of Independent Schools (2 folders)

Report with history and philosophy of the school, parent survey results, and Board of Governors evaluation. For each school, the 1992 report contains a purpose statement, information about staffing policies, a description of programs and curriculum, and description of the decision-making process. Supporting charts and appendixes included throughout.
